title.rendered: Why Actions Speak Louder Than Degrees

content.rendered:
Why Actions Speak Louder Than Degrees

The prominent financial publication –Financial Express – has featured the authored article by Vaibhav Vats, Co-Founder of Digiperform, in its weekly education supplement-Education, today in both print and online edition.

The publication has carried the article- Skills over degrees, the new success mantra for millennials under the headline section ‘Why actions speak louder than degrees‘ stating the importance of Skills to choose the path of success.

Coverage Details:

 

Headline– Why actions speak louder than degrees

Publication–  The Financial Express

Edition– National (Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Chandigarh, Chennai, Coimbatore, Delhi, Hyderabad, Kochi, Kolkata, Lucknow, Mumbai, and Pune)

Page-12

Date– June 4th, 2018

Link– https://www.financialexpress.com/economy/why-actions-speak-louder-than-degrees/1192146/

excerpt.rendered: The prominent financial publication -Financial Express – has featured the authored article by Vaibhav Vats, Co-Founder of Digiperform, in its weekly education supplement-Education, today in both print and online edition.
